description: Non-material amendment to 19/02718/RE3 to allow the changes to wording of Condition 40 to read "Prior to the commencement of development on any individual phase except Plot Z02_01, and prior to the commencement of superstructure works on Plot Z02_01 identified pursuant to Condition 10, details of the laying out and planting of open spaces within that phase and the layout, design and type of play equipment to be provided (except the off-plot playspace provision for Plot Z02_01 where addressed by 22/02098/RM) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be completed in accordance with the approved details."
site_name: Meridian WaterOrbital Business Park (and Adjoining Land Including Land South Of Argon Road And Land Known As Ikea Clear And Gas Holder Leeside Road)5 Argon RoadLondonN18 3BZ
